trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event occurs when the user requests help for a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>用户请求控件帮助时发生事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs> object specifies the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer and whether the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs>对象指定在鼠标指针和是否处理过此事件的屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过该帮助事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理过事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property to `true` the event will be passed to Windows for additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置为此属性`true`事件将传递给 Windows 以进行其他处理。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>事件以便包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>通过按 F1 键和焦点位于地址字段中，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击帮助光标地址字段上的引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性设置为 true，则指示`HelpRequested`处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示存储中的帮助文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标指针的屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> representing the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 表示鼠标指针屏幕坐标的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this information to provide help based on the position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此信息可用于提供基于在鼠标指针的位置上的帮助。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
